title: Tarar grieved over demise of Dubai Consulate Press Counsellor’s father
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 30 (APP):Minister for Information, Broadcasting, National Heritage and Culture Attaullah Tarar on Saturday expressed deep sorrow over the passing of the father of Muhammad Saleh Khan, the Press Counselor at the Pakistani Consulate in Dubai, the United Arab Emirates.
The minister, in his condolence message, stated, “A father is a great blessing, and their loss is an immense tragedy.” He extended heartfelt condolences to Muhammad Saleh Khan and the rest of the bereaved family, assuring them of his
The minister prayed for the departed soul and sought patience for the bereaved family.
